pages.text: 70|11|[Dar hole ki] Onon ʙa jakdigar nişon doda meşavand, gunahgor [dūst dorad va] orzu mekunad, ki farzandoni xudro dar ʙaroʙari [rahoī az] azoʙi on rūz ʙidihad
70|12|Va [hamcunin] hamsaru ʙarodaraşro
70|13|va qaʙilaaşro, ki [hameşa] ʙa ū ço va panoh medod
70|14|Va [hamcunin] hamai onhoero, ki rūji zamin hastand, [fido kunad] to naçot joʙad
70|15|[Ammo] Hargiz cunin nest! Be gumon, on şu'lahoi [otaşi] sūzon ast
70|16|[Ki] pūst az sar ʙarmekanad
70|17|Kasonero, ki [ʙa farmoni Alloh taolo] puşt kardand va [az haq] rūj gardonidand, [ʙa sūi xud] faro mexonad
70|18|Va [niz kasonero, ki] amvolro çam'ovarī va zaxira kardand [va haqqi onro napardoxtand]
70|19|Jaqinan, inson kamtoqat [-u haris] ofarida şudaast
70|20|Har goh ʙadī [va musiʙate] ʙa ū rasad, ʙetoʙī mekunad
70|21|Va har goh xuʙī ʙa ū rasad, ʙozdoranda [va ʙaxil] megardad
70|22|Magar namozguzoron
70|23|Hamon kasone, ki ʙar namozhojaşon hameşa pojdorī mekunand
70|24|Va kasone, ki dar amvolaşon haqqi [muajjanu] ma'lume hast
70|25|Baroi mustamand va mahrum
70|26|Va [hamon] kasone, ki rūzi çazoro tasdiq mekunand
70|27|Va kasone, ki az azoʙi Parvardigoraşon metarsand
70|28|[Caro ki] Be gumon, az azoʙi Parvardigoraşon dar amon natavonand ʙud
70|29|Va kasone, ki şarmgohhojaşonro nigah medorand
70|30|Magar ʙo hamsaronu kanizone, ki moliki onho hastand, ki [dar in surat] sarzanişe ʙar onho nest
70|31|Pas, har kas farotar az inhoro ʙixohad, onon mutaçovizon hastand
70|32|Va kasone, ki amonatho va pajmonhojaşonro rioja mekunand
70|33|Va kasone, ki ʙa şahodathoi xud mutaahhidand
70|34|Va kasone, ki ʙar namozaşon pojdorī mekunand
70|35|Inon dar ʙoƣho [-i ʙihişt] giromī doşta meşavand
70|36|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] kofironro ci şudaast, ki ʙa sūji tu meşitoʙand
70|37|[Va] Az rostu cap gurūh-gurūh [huçum meovarand]
70|38|Ojo har kadom az onho [ʙo on a'moli nopisandaşon] tama' dorand, ki dar ʙihişti purne'mat [-i ilohī] darovarda şavand
70|39|Hargiz cunin nest! Be gumon, Mo onhoro az on ci [xud] medonand, ofaridaem
